metadata.title: CVE-2017-17913 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In GraphicsMagick 1.4 snapshot-20171217 Q8, there is a stack-based bufferover-read in WriteWEBPImage in coders/webp.c, related to an incompatibilitywith libwebp versions, 0.5.0 and later, that use a different structuretype.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17913` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.27-3
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.27-3
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.27-3
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.27-3
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.27-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.27-3').
